chapter.title: Building Images
chapter.para: In case you want to build your own image based on a base image pulled from e.g. the docker hub, you should use the docker internal build system. A standard procedure of creating your images based on other docker images is the following.

Currently we cannot distribute &sles; images for Docker because there is no way to associate an End-User License Agreement (EULA) to a Docker image. sle2docker enables you t o import pre-build &sles; images that you can use for creating base &sles; images.
